scripts.dev:app: npm run transpile:app && cross-env NODE_ENV=development electron .
scripts.copy:data: node -e "const fs=require('fs'),p=require('path');const d=p.join('dist-app','data');fs.mkdirSync(d,{recursive:true});fs.copyFileSync(p.join('src','app','data','ams2-game-data.json'),p.join(d,'ams2-game-data.json'));console.log('Copied game data to dist-app/data/')"
scripts.dist:mac: npm run transpile:app && npm run build && electron-builder --mac --x64
scripts.dist:win: npm run transpile:app && npm run build && electron-builder --win --x64
scripts.dist:linux: npm run transpile:app && npm run build && electron-builder --linux --x64
scripts.release: npm run transpile:app && npm run build && electron-builder --publish always
scripts.version:patch: npm version patch && git push origin master --tags
scripts.version:minor: npm version minor && git push origin master --tags
scripts.version:major: npm version major && git push origin master --tags
